tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP$ My) (NN life)) (: ...) (VP (VBZ is) (VP (VBN based) (PP (IN on) (NP (DT a) (JJ true) (NN story))))) (. .)))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [based/VBN nsubjpass>[life/NN nmod:poss>My/PRP$] punct>.../: auxpass>is/VBZ nmod:on>[story/NN case>on/IN det>a/DT amod>true/JJ] punct>./.]
